item.title: Near-Optimality of Contrastive Divergence Algorithms
item.description: Contrastive Divergence algorithms achieve near-optimal parameter estimation rates, matching the CramÃ©r-Rao lower bound under specific conditions, as proven by a novel non-asymptotic analysis.
